summary: The implementation successfully adds local file import functionality to the ScanPage with a new FileImport component. All four requirements (REQ-9, REQ-10, REQ-11, REQ-12) are implemented. The file input supports JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats, processes imported files through the same workflow as camera captures (including ImageEditor), updates ScanPage state management to handle both input modes via tabs, and provides clear UI affordances with a tabbed interface showing Camera and Import File options. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.

hallucinated_features.description: Drag-and-drop file upload functionality in FileImport component
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest and requirements make no mention of drag-and-drop support. Only file selection via button/input was requested. The implementation adds handleDragOver, handleDragLeave, and handleDrop handlers with visual feedback for dragging state.
No file size constraints or validation requirements were specified in the BuildRequest. The implementation adds validation rejecting files larger than 10MB.

hallucinated_features.description: Error messaging and validation UI with Alert component
hallucinated_features.reason: While basic format validation aligns with accepting specific image types, the BuildRequest does not specify requirements for error handling, error messages, or validation feedback UI.
